    <QT, QC, QR> boolean
    AbstractAction.affectsInstanceQuery(C config, R result, InstanceQuery<QT,QC,QR> query, QC queryConfig, QT target)
    Determine whether this action, when configured via config, could possibly change the result of the given instance query, assuming it was configured with queryConfig and executed on target.
